paragraphs.text:
%md
## Variable-Length Paths

This tutorial shows how to find **reachability**.

Please visit [the relevant section in pgql-lang.org](https://pgql-lang.org/spec/1.3/#variable-length-paths) for more details.

![](https://pgql-lang.org/images/example_graphs/pgql_min_max_hop.png)

msg.data:
Variable-Length Paths

This tutorial shows how to find reachability.

Please visit the relevant section in pgql-lang.org for more details.

paragraphs.title: Connect to Graph Server
paragraphs.text:
%pgx

baseUrl = 'http://graph-server:7007'
username = 'graph_dev'
password = 'Welcome1'

conn = new URL("$baseUrl/auth/token").openConnection()
conn.setRequestProperty('Content-Type', 'application/json')
token = conn.with {
  doOutput = true
  requestMethod = 'POST'
  outputStream.withWriter { writer ->
    writer << JsonOutput.toJson([username: username, password: password])
  }
  return new JsonSlurper().parseText(content.text).access_token
}

instance = Pgx.getInstance(baseUrl, token)
session = instance.createSession("my-session")

paragraphs.title: Zero or more
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:likes*/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Amy'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: One or more (1)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:likes+/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Amy'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: One or more (2)
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:knows+/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Judith'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Optional
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:knows?/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Judith'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Exactly n
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:likes{2}/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Amy'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: n or more
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:likes{2,}/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Amy'
""");

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Between n and m
paragraphs.text:
%pgx
graph.queryPgql("""
SELECT y.name
  FROM MATCH (x:Person) -/:likes{1,2}/-> (y)
 WHERE x.name = 'Amy'
""");
